title: Import login and password data from a file
summary: Starting in Firefox version 116, you can import login and password information from a ''.csv'' file. Learn How.
html:
Starting in Firefox version 116, you can import login and password information from a .csv (comma separated values) file. You can use either one of these methods:

Import from Firefox Settings

  1. In the Menu bar at the top of the screen, click Firefox and then select Preferences or Settings, depending on your macOS version.Click the menu button and select Settings.
  2. In the General panel to the left, click on Import Data under the Import Browser Data section.
  3. Select Passwords from CSV file.
  4. Select the .csv file that contains the login data you wish to import and click Open.
  5. All set! Click Done to wrap up the import.

Import from Logins menu

  1. Click the menu button to open the menu panel.
  2. Click Logins and PasswordsPasswords.
    • The Firefox about:logins page will open in a new tab.
  3. Click the 3-dot menu icon, then click Import from a File…
  4. Select the .csv file that contains the login data you wish to import and click Open.
  5. Click Done to complete the import.
Note: Firefox does not save or sync login data from another browser or file unless you choose to import it. This data is stored locally in a readable form on your computer by the other browser.

You can use either one of these methods: Import from Firefox Settings In the Menu bar at the top of the screen, click Firefox and then select Preferences or Settings , depending on your macOS version. Click the menu button and select Settings . In the General panel to the left, click on Import Data under the Import Browser Data section. Select Passwords from CSV file . Select the .csv file that contains the login data you wish to import and click Open . All set! Click Done to wrap up the import. Import from Logins menu Click the menu button to open the menu panel. Click Logins and Passwords Passwords . The Firefox about:logins page will open in a new tab. Click the 3-dot menu icon, then click Import from a File… Select the .csv file that contains the login data you wish to import and click Open . Click Done to complete the import. Note: Firefox does not save or sync login data from another browser or file unless you choose to import it. This data is stored locally in a readable form on your computer by the other browser.
